turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, Nice to chat with you today.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: hi, you too. where are you from?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I am from New York, USA and you, where are you from?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Rockford, Illinois...#3 most dangerous city. :(

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Oh boy, I am sorry to hear that. I lived in NYC for 30 years but then moved to a very small rural town in northern NY. There is hardly any crime here.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm glad you are safe!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I hope that you remain safe too. Have you ever heard of Save The Children organization?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I sure have.  Pretty reputable?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Oh yes, I do believe they are. Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sounds like a great organization. I know that they have a hard time in developing countries, especially getting fresh drinking water. We are fortunate to live here.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes, we certainly are. Those in Flint MI have been having trouble getting clean water for themselves. Back to Save The Children though. They do so much with all their donations. Have you ever donated to them before?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm not sure if I have. I'm always donating to shelter animal charities in Saint Jude. But I don't think I have donated to save the children.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I too donate to animal shelters and I have also donated to St Jude. I was not sure I have donated to Save The Children in the past either.The research team asked me if I would donate some of my pay for this HIT to Save The Children today.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Are you going to donate any money to this charity?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes I felt like I must do something to help. I know it will not be much but the work they do is so very important. You could donate some or all of your payment to the organization as well. Are you interested?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Sure I'm interested. It's the right thing to do. How much were you thinking?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I was thinking of giving them the whole amount. I feel strongly that help is needed for children's rights to health, education, safety, etc. Have you ever checked out their website?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, I haven't.  I can give 1.00.  I have puppies to feed!!  Not saying that they are more important, but they are my kids. Sound good?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: So you plan to give $1.00? That is a fantastic amount. Yes you are right your pups are your kids and they are just as important. I bet the pups give you some security in the high crime area.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, they most definitely do. And I will donate a dollar. I'm not sure how to go about doing it but you can put me down for a dollar. Have a great night

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children." I think what we are doing will help. I wish you well.
